entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecutionStrategy does not apply to Migrate() and various other functions #27450
  • System.InvalidOperationException #27449
  • EF Core 6.0 cannot traslate DateTime .Date to SQL #27448
  • SQL Server: When retrieving generated columns in insert, concurrency may cause us to get the original generated value #27446
  • Regression in Compiled-Query-Cache #27443
  • sporadically EF Core returning incorrect data and throwing InvalidCastException #27442
  • Cosmos: Selecting complex properties (object or collections mapped as "OwnsOne" and "OwnsMany") makes the query return the entire document #27440
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Should Migrations create Indexes for BOTH properties of a M2M Skip Navigation Join Entity #27445
  • If Owned Entity Type is initialized from constructor on principal it is not being tracked #27444
  • How to query dbcontext for entries with modified properties #27441
  • FindAsync not return latest data #27432
  • Optimize hangs and stops responding. #27301
    6.0.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Unlink of file '.dotnet/dotnet.exe' failed. Should I try again? (y/n) #27451
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0 Preview 1 #27447
    blocked

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27375 - EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - migration rollback doesn't work #27379
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] SQLite: Don't modify collection while enumerating inside ReclaimLeakedConnections #27428
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27356 - Collection_navigation_equal_to_null_for_subquery fails after merging from release/6.0 #27429
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.4
